---
title: "Listings page"
listing:
  contents: 
    - "docs/data/**/*.md"
    - "docs/data/**/*.qmd"
    - "docs/software/**/*.md"
    - "docs/software/**/*.qmd"
    - "docs/infrastructure/**/*.md"
    - "docs/infrastructure/**/*.qmd"
  type: grid
  grid-columns: 3
  page-size: 12
  categories: numbered
  sort: title #date desc
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  #image-height: 0px
  #image-placeholder: "docs/img/empty.png"
  fields: [title, description, date, categories, reading-time]

---
